review_blob: Light body with a subtle aroma of maple. Light texture, heavy on maple taste but not much else to it. Nothing spectacular but not bad.
Copper color with a nice body. Very hoppy, great carbonation for an IPA. Slightly bitter but refreshing aftertaste.
Golden amber haze with a light head. Aroma doesnt translate well to the taste but still a quality ale.
Light and crisp. Nice aroma. The chamomile is well represented. Not much of an aftertaste. Overall a decent weizen.
